verbs.description: New York Daily News sports , race and social issues columnist Carron J. Phillips [V: has] figured out the litmus test President Donald Trump uses to determine which sports champions receive invitations to the White House and those that do n’t . It ’s mainly based on the race and gender of the athletes , among other questionable motives . Which is why it ’s better for the NHL Stanley Cup
